name: Firefight! (itch)
description:
The year is 21XX.  The evil Flame Gang is terrorizing the city of Neo Alva, trapping hostages within burning buildings.   In response, Duck the fire-fighting robot is sent in to rescue the hostages and extinguish the threat of the Flame Gang once and for all!

  • Lots of levels!  Five worlds to explore, each with a new game mechanic to astound and amaze!
  • All-original retro soundtrack!  Sine and square waves hand-picked by a team of experts to maximize childhood suggestibility
  • Gamepad support: Play it with a controller whydon'tcha?!
